Review_Text: The food showed up days late and it was hot and left in the sun my the mail carrier. It was placed so far from where we receive mail that i didn't notice the package before my neighbors dogs tore apart one of the boxes and scattered trash all over. I need a more reliable service where it shows up when it is suppose to so i don't have to check every hour of every day then make sure that it is actually safe to eat after sitting in a hot warehouse after not being delivered for several days.

Customer service went above and beyond to help with an unusual situation (for us); it was especially important as this was a first-time try out for my mother who is living alone. Timely, problem-solving and thoughtful.

I am really enjoying my venture into these vegan meals. I had a slight mixup in the tracking information and you very promptly replied. Excellent customer service. The meals so far have been very good and the amount in each meal is very generous. I am looking forward to the remainder of my order. Thank you for making this available.

Let‚Äôs see where to start: 1. Broken plastic containers- no I‚Äôm not going to pick through my food and tell you whether the food is edible. If the container is broken just replace it or better yet have better packaging and delivery 2. Fresh doesn‚Äôt last more than 3 days and then it gets moldy, rotten. Just provide food options that lasts. 3. Carbs, so heavy in carbs 4. Taste- sometimes bland sometimes just gross 5. We keep sending you pictures and provide feedback but the problems don‚Äôt change 6. Salads spoil quickly, all chopped foods spoil quickly- maybe vary up the fresh‚Ä¶ flex the imagination and creative juices for vegan foods that are tasty and that last

Customer service is great! The meals actually arrive fresh with crispy fresh vegetables. They also stay fresh in the fridge for quite some time. I love the interesting selection of meals that are all plant based and low salt.
The portions are perfect. It makes you feel good knowing you are eating organic, gluten free, tasty food! My only concern with ordering any prepared food is the amount of packaging .

I was concerned that the meals would be all veggie and, well, taste like "all veggie"...but they were not! They are extremely flavorful and each meal is distinctly different! The first order has now led to a second order and with more to come!
Food is super fresh and tasty. I love the variety, micronutrients, and not having to plan or prep for my lunches. The time saved, without skimping on nutritional value, is clutch.

Sprinly has significantly increased the quality of my life! I know it sounds crazy to say that, but seriously. I know longer have to make that dreaded decision of ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs for dinner‚Äù, we‚Äôre eating healthier and eating lighter (while still feeling completely satisfied!) our toddler loves it as well, which is a huge plus. The user experience has been effortless and I love that the packaging is recyclable. Overall, we adore Sprinly and the ease it‚Äôs brought to our lives. Thank you Sprinly!

the food is awesome, great ingredients and flavors, and portioned well. We usually get all 6 to have variety and there has not been one meal that has disappointed. It feels good eating your food, from a culinary and a health perspective. Kudos!
Tasteless and takes some effort to unpack, especially those smaller plastic containers

Hello SPRINLY, The meals were all nutritious and tasty and fresh, neatly packaged with a good description of the ingredients. All meals were unusual for me, and I was glad to realize that the calorie count, which was not noted, but every meal did lead to a welcome loss of a few pounds in the course of a week. On my own I tend to make things meatier with more cream or cheese to cause the main course to be heavier. I Am glad to realize that I can have vegetarian variety and still feel well fed, I believe that these meals are on the cutting edge of what may well become a standard American diet. Probably I am somewhat addicted to my mother‚Äôs old-fashioned recipes.

I was hoping for more everyday foods, and not so much greens. I am sorry my husband and I didn't find the foods tasty. I would have liked to see something like bean burritos or sandwiches, and no so much greens that looked like dandelion greens.

Generally a good service providing quality meals for people on the go. I‚Äôve found if the package doesn‚Äôt get picked up and all meals put in the fridge immediately they go bad in a few days‚Ä¶Would like to see less plastic and more compostable materials used in shipments.
I was very impressed! All of the recipes were delicious and filling! Will definitely order more in the future. My only constructive criticism would be to add expiration dates if possible. üòä
This week's order hasn't arrived, which probably means I clicked something wrong, but I did select all my meals for this week. No food and it's Wednesday now. sad face emoji

For health reasons, I decided to try a plant-based diet. My doctor suggested Sprinly. I was hesitant at first because I could not imagine cutting out meat completely.  I was pleasantly surprised by the meals from Sprinly. They are delicious and filling. I love the fact that the food is fresh (not frozen) and very convenient - just heat and eat. I can actually see myself eating this way for life.

The food is delicious. And the portions are larger than expected. Carrot bacon is my favorite by the way! The instructions are super easy to follow, and the flavors are so satisfying! I could never eat plant based like this, if I was cooking for myself! Everything is packaged well. I love everything so far!
Food is delicious and incredibly fresh. I have tried many different plant based meal delivery services and this is by far the most fresh and delicious. I can‚Äôt wait to try what comes next week!
Every thing tastes great. My wife and I are satisfied with all of the meals we‚Äôve chosen.

So far, pretty good. Nutritional information is on target, great and easy option for a schoolteacher with limited time for lunch. It‚Äôs pretty tasty too and most importantly filling and satisfying. Pretty excited for this option. I don‚Äôt love microwaving but I have some salad options coming next shipment and I‚Äôm excited to try. Not a ton of options but enough to vary my week.

I liked the personal touch of the handwritten card with receipt of my first delivery. That was a nice touch. I really enjoyed the beet root salad. I have Crohn‚Äôs disease so I appreciate the quality of ingredients. I appreciate the composition of the recipes but was a little disappointed in the lack of flavor. Most tasted very bland‚Ä¶not just salt, which I understand is a preference, but flavor in spices and herbs. I think you could use bolder flavors to really stand out and make the experience closer to the value of an $18 meal.

Every meal was super fresh quality and full of wonderful flavors I've not found anywhere else. Though the lasagna was a bit too bland other than red pepper. And the cauliflower tofu bowl was too tangy of vinegar. All included salads/dressing/topping were delicious. And the power bowls were spot on. I'm vegetarian but I'm not looking to incorporate fake meat in my diet, I'm looking for true vegetarian meals full of veggie goodness. Keep up the creativity! Thanks for your time.

The food is absolutely delicious. I have tried a lot; when I say a lot, I mean every brand for healthy/veggie quick meal options. When I know well in advance I will have a rough week; I want fast, easy-to-prepare, tasty meals. This is the place. You have managed to combine flavors that travel well. They are unique, and the proportion sizes are perfect. Please don't ever stop.
Food is really good & delivery has been flawless
Have had 3 dinners so far. All have been excellent. A couple could be a serving for 2 ! Curious about the sugar content.
The food is exceptional. The delivery is great. The portions are MORE THAN generous. As with any service - the packaging is a lot. It is recyclable but still a lot to handle.
Tasty product, the best we've had from a meal service company. Easy to heat up if needed. Less than 10 minutes from refrigerator to table.

I was impressed how cold and fresh the food arrived after 5 days of travel. The flavors are good and the food very healthy I would appreciate the addition of the sugar content listed on the nutrition information if possible. I‚Äôm pre diabetic and need to watch my sugar

I have only eaten two meals, but everything has been satisfying and filling. I‚Äôve tried other meal plans and they have been really boring, and I‚Äôm still hungry after eaten the meal. I hope this trend continues. Happy to get back to a plant based diet.

Delicious food! So far we've eaten the Pesto pasta and the Black beans, rice, and Avocado crema and it's been delish. My only complaint is that the salsas were spilled inside and came out of the actual food package, so I wasn't able to try the tomatillo salsa; I'd recommend a different packaging if they don't stay on well. Other than that, very good!
Interesting variety of meals requiring minimal effort by me ,pricey , but delicious

I've tried almost ALL of the food delivery services and I like the Sprinly food and service the best. Everything is creative and fresh, plus easy to unpack. I don't have time to cook, so I enjoy being surprised every week with a new selection of yummy meals. Keep up the great work!
From ordering, delivery packaging, menu, taste, and portion it is deserving of 5 stars. The meals are tasty, balanced in flavor and I so enjoy coming home after work to dinner. Wonderful.

We loved the food and appreciated the opportunity to eat plant based meals. Our box arrived on time but we were disappointed that two of the plastic meal trays broke during transit. In one case a multitude of plastic shards forced us to throw out the sauce for one meal. I wish the packaging could be more environmentally friendly.

I was pleasantly surprised by the quality, taste and how long the food lasted. Not your traditional boring meal prep. Also, all my food allergies were met. I never felt sick after consuming the food. This is huge because you really never know 100%.

I was confused because I was charged 2 1/2 weeks prior to receiving any food. Thankfully, customer service reached out and we've cleared that up. I'm happy to say that the meals I've had so far are really wonderful. They arrived at a good temperature due to excellent packaging and are easy to heat and eat - wonderful flavors as well. I look forward to trying more of the product and perhaps bumping up my review to five stars.

Food is so fresh and delicious and I'm feeling great on it. I look forward to every meal. I appreciate that the seasonings are mild as I have a sensitive stomach. I especially loved the frittata and salads. The beet burger was great (and I don't love beets). I'm dealing with a chronic illness and I'm crediting these meals with a general overall improvement in my well being in just one week. ‚ù§

Sprinly's customer service and website slick-ness exceeded my expectations from the start. I have tried several other food meal services and found them more work than they were worth. As someone with Celiac who also enjoys discovering new flavors and foods (hello, we like to eat good stuff, too!!), this type of service is very near & dear to me and my family. The fact that they are recycling-savvy, conscious of their ingredient sources, label everything, explain everything, explain the "why" behind their dishes and the benefits to eating specific foods, and clearly indicate that everything is vegan AND gf had me at hello. To top it off, I received a hand-written 'thank you' upon our first delivery - no one does that! We'd absolutely, wholeheartedly recommend them.

I am battling Invasive breast cancer and needed to make an immediate change to my diet. I was told plant based is best. But with chemotherapy, I do not have the energy or brain power to much of anything. Also, I have a 10 year old Type 1 Diabetic who is struggling with skin issues related to her Type 1. Together, we can quickly, with little effort have an amazing tasting, healthy meal. It has helped my physical AND mental health to have the meals in my fridge ready to go. It is cost prohibitive while I can't work, but we are asking for Sprinly when family and friends ask us how they can help. The food is go good!!!!
Great customer service....healthy, fresh, delicious plant based meals

*timely delivery, one day earlier than expected! *delicious meals but needed twice the recommended time to cook *as a single, got 2 meals per dish üëèüëèüëè *just ordered my second order and really look forward to new dishes (when I food prep I often do repeats to kerp it simple) *after first order, when I mistakenly paused too soon, a representative kindly agreed to fix it for me with clear instructions for next time (in other words, great customer coverage!) * I do not like all the disposable packaging but understand the need for it to keep food safe‚Ä¶I do appreciate the instructions for how to properly dispose of each piece! *the handwritten thank you note was a great personal touch and very surprising! Thank you so much for your great system and your obvious commitment to a great experience!üôè

I had two deliveries so far and can't complain about the food quality and the taste. Low fat and sodium. I like that the order is prebuilt weekly and I don't have to think too much to eat healthy. What doesn't work for me is FedEx deliveries. It takes almost 3 days to deliver the order and I'm afraid thatit'is simply won't work in summer.
The food is delicious!I loved the hand written thank you card with my first order. Very sweet.
Food tasted great. Came delivered perfect. I loved each meal. Easy was to go vegan and eat healthy. Will keep ordering.
Didn't like the majority of food; threw away enchiladas & marinara. Also, had I known your meals were so extremely high in carbs, I never would have ordered.

I have only tried 3 meals so far however they have all been delicious. I also had questions about how to set up my account as I do not need meals every week, and Sprinly got right back to me and has been extremely helpful!

The food is very tasty, and I really appreciate the info on calories, etc. Also extremely grateful for emphasis on low sodium ‚Äî this is huge when you‚Äôre attempting to manage or lose weight. Most home meal kits pack their food with sodium and therefore, not a good choice for me. My only issue is that some meals have arrived with unsecured lids making a messy toss ‚Äî I know it‚Äôs a hazard of shipping but all lids should be checked to make sure they are secure and will stay closed.

Too much pasta and rice and use of tomatoes . Prefer more variety of veggies and mushrooms, beans, etc over pasta rice nor quinoa. Dressing lid not closed Other than that packaging and quality was great. The lasagna was great, thebpasta with tomatobcakes...just too much bread and pasta. Salad was boring typical carrots and tomatoes. Do not want quinoa in salad. Some mandarin orges, cranberry, shredded broccoli or Cabbage would have bean better.
Easy to fix. Perfect ingredients that fit my wife‚Äôs dietary restrictions. And delicious. We will rate each meal. Thanks
The meals are fresh, nutritious, and free of excessive oils, salt, and sugar! They are a terrific option for those looking for healthy and tasty plant-based meals.

I ordered six different meals the first week. Each one was fresh, nicely packaged, and a good portion size. Flavors were good but not great. I thought they were all little bland. All were healthy, plant based, and gluten-free (although I would personally prefer not to be gluten free). Salads were particularly good, with interesting dressings.
Inventive meals and a great variety so far in my experience. ( I‚Äôm in my second week) seems as if great care is taken in preparing these meals. I am very happy I choose Spinly.

I thoroughly enjoyed my first week on SPRINLY. After my first day/meal; I felt wonderful: energetic and happy; I knew I was on the right path to good health. I am seriously thinking of doing this on a weekly basis instead of every other week.

Great experience so far. The meals were delivery as expected with great packaging to keep them fresh and cold. Customer service is very responsive and helpful. Plus the food is delicious and fit my active and vegan lifestyle perfectly!

Liked: (1) Customer service is top-notch. Responsive, friendly, knowledgeable, easy to reach. (2) Easy to choose and plan different meals for weeks ahead. Sprinly system will save your choices for all the different weeks.  Why I quit: (1) This food was too hard on my gut. Was all day in the bathroom with loose #*^*# if I ate a Sprinly meal for more than one consecutive day. Roughage is good, but good grief this much fiber did a number (pun intended) on me. (2) Too many weird, pungent flavors masking the simple taste of food. I don't like it when the condiments/dressings overwhelm the food. (3) Time-sensitive pressure to eat the plates in a certain order, i.e. signs printed on plates stating "eat me first" implying will go bad if not eaten first. Then guilt if not eaten in time.

The first noodle dish was pretty bland tasting. Sauce was watery, no veggies. I did not make it correctly so I have 2 more noodle meals and I will follow the directions and hope it‚Äôs better tasting.
The food was really good. However all the little packets of sauces and dressings were broken open from shipping resulting in the sauces all over the food and sides of containers. Disappointing.

Amazing customer service, beautifully packaged meals, and delicious food. I am so impressed with the quality of the food. It‚Äôs gourmet delivered right to your door. Thank you so much for the personalized note. Everything has been A+++ to date!
Meals are delicious. My first box and love it. Presentation great on the plate and soooooo good. Calorie amount, lower sodium great. Delivery was timely and everything packed well.
The problem with Sprinly is that although they supposedly promote healthy cuisine, they can't tailor items to eliminate toxic ingredients such as salt. It is sad.
I am exploring the different flavors and meals and it has been awesome and delicious! The convenience is wonderful too when I'm too tired to cook!!!!
Love the meals! Would have given 5 stars if not for the sodium content - too high in my opinion.
Pleasantly surprised the first week of meals were delightful and very tasty.., looking forward to my next delivery
Love the food! An item was missing from one of the dishes. Otherwise, I‚Äôm a happy camper so far.

Sprinly, a plant based meal company has well thought out prepared meals that are not only nutritious but also delicious! I am amazed at the creativity given to plant based foods using healthy herbs and spices. The information provided on the package surround is thorough, informative and even provides a photo of what the plate might look like. I am impressed with the fresh quality of each dish, always arriving looking like a chef prepared the meal just for one....Thank you for this experience. It has been difficult for me to justify the expense and convenience, when I now have the time and energy to prepare foods for myself. I have gained ideas for my future endeavor in the plant based world. I find it also difficult to justify the packaging, use of plastics and the travel it takes arrive at the convenience of my front door. It would be nice to find these products in a Trader Joe's when I shop for my weekly goods....Best of luck and sorry to be leaving....It has been a wonderful experience. Frankie

Food is very good but some of the sauces spilled in the packaging, making the entire box messy. I‚Äôd have liked the different small boxes with liquid in them to have been closed more tightly. The food was nutritious and delicious, although some things like the serving of pasta could be a tad more. But all in all, a great plant-based healthy food menu so although it‚Äôs only been a week but I look forward to upcoming deliveries.

Was disappointed by how few vegetables were in the meals. For example, I got a pasta dish with literally three florets of broccoli. Feel like it's pretty pricey for a cup or two of brown rice pasta , three broccoli florets and some sauce. Other meals about the same- hard to eat veggie/ plant based without many veggies. Disappointed.
Very tasty and large portions, and I appreciated the thoughtful handwritten note in my first order! Looking forward to next week already!

The customer service is good. You can tell this company is kind and caring (that's why 2 stars). However, this review is specifically for the food itself. I, unfortunately did not enjoy 99% of my meals. Some of the meals were not fresh and wilted (think dead mushy carrots), and the portion sizes were small for most. The sauces were super watery and unappealing. (Although, I did like the lemon vinaigrette.) Maybe it's the long distance it travels to get to me, but it didn't taste fresh, didn't look appetizing, and sadly didn't taste good. I'm big on flavor and it didn't deliver. The sad part is I forgot to stop my subscription in time, so now I have another 12 meals being delivered that I will try to give away.

We enjoyed our first week of meals very much. It was nice to have some that were ready to eat, to take for lunch or on the run. Then it was nice to have some which needed minimal cooking to quickly have a hot dinner. They were very delicious! Looking forward to this week (especially the risotto).
The food is so fresh, healthy, delicious and easy! The directions are clear. I like the emphasis on plating the food rather than just heating and eating in the plastic container.
I think the sauce is too sweet and plus some of the food does not have any taste unless I have to add that too sweet sauce came with it.
Food is fresh, delicious and healthy as promised but my deliveries keep coming on Wednesday‚Äôs when I‚Äôd prefer them Monday for my work week.

Your customer service and delivery are exceptional. I love your meal kids but unfortunately my husband is old school and only likes the traditional meat and potatoes type of meal. Unfortunately I will need to cancel my subscription

The food was so good. I was unsure how the quality would be with with the fresh veggies after being shipped and I was blown away by the quality. It‚Äôs so yummy, and satiating. I also loved the time this have given me not needing to prep meals. Efficient!
Meals are organic and healthy. Salt is on the lower side and I can add my own. Meals are tasty and portion is adequate. Customer service always responds within a day.
Great fresh meals that actually taste great without adding any condiments or seasonings. My only qualm is that there aren't enough nut and seed free options available on a weekly basis.

I feel more energy, which is great because I am doing a bootcamp for work and it requires about 20/30 extra hours /week. I have to say, this plan isn't going to work for everyone........ right away. You can't go from eating ribeye and lobster to this. Why? What you use to season and how things are cooked are very different. Plus, if you don't really eat vegetables you shouldn't waste your money. However; if you want to treat your body better but don't have the time to really cook this is a great option. I just got my second box, and I was very surprised about the pesto. I normally stay far from that but this version is way better. Everything is very thought out right down to the packing, thank you Sprinly you are saving my life, LITERALLY!
The food is delicious and fresh! I‚Äôve tried several different companies and this one is my favorite!
Sprinly wants to satisfy their customers. I‚Äôve had an unusual event occur and they were very cooperative. Nice company.

All the meals were very good and easy to prepare. We started at a good time because my husband fell and broke his leg and had to have surgery. He is now home recuperating and having these meals is taking some of the workload off of me. I would give it five stars, but the container of curry in one meal was impossible to open. I ended up making a hole in the lid and getting as much of the curry out as I could.
Surprised! Good quantity! Fresh! Tasty Seasonings! Excited to get next order. I need reminders of my order dates and stop dates. Looking for suggestions for my next order.

First order, I made the mistake of freezing the salads, disaster. The other dishes were very enjoyable. My suggestion is to give more attention to seasons. Right now more soups and less salads would be appropriate.

I like the food. Healthy. Fresh. Tasty. It is higher in carbs than I like, so I half the portions. I am trying to lose weight, and at 53, post-menopausal, I cannot do a lot of carbs.  I have to skip a week because I have a lot of extra food.  I like prepared meals. I work from home and need quick lunches. My kids do not eat vegan, so good just for me and I make them what they need.  Kind owners. Super sweet personalized note thanking me for the order.  The $94 a week intro offer is helpful on a single parent income.
Your customer service is IMPECCABLE and so far the first meal we‚Äôve tried is delicious. Loved the email updates too!
The food is great. The service from your employees is excellent. Every email I sent was answered immediately.

Everything is packaged nicely The containers can be reused at home for leftovers. Easy to prepare. So far every meal has been very good and filling!!!! I am very happy with my order so far. Healthy, organic, easy prep, vegan, satisfying and tastes great!! A win win!!!!!

Overall, your food is quite tasty. I assumed it would be good for a week but found, when I opened the curry dish I had ordered on the 6th day after delivery, it smelled funky and the quinoa had a really slimy consistency. I threw it away.  Also, the box of 6 meals was delivered to our mail locker (I live in apartments), quite a way from my home. It's a heavy box for an 80 year old woman to be schlepping.  For these reasons, I have discontinued service, but wish you the best of luck.
Delivered on time, fresh ingredients, easy to prepare and very tasty meals. This service basically checked all the boxes for me. I will be enjoying more of this service without a doubt.
The food is much better than expected Actually delicious!!!  Just wish there was less packaging
I loved everything! I‚Äôm looking forward to getting connected again for the week of June 5th.

Unfortunately I didn‚Äôt like any of the meals. Sometimes they were too intense and sometimes too bland. The overall flavor wasn‚Äôt there for me. However, I wish you the best and hope for continued success.
The meals were very tasty and well prepared. The portions were perfect size for one person. Recommend this company.

I was really hoping this would be the meal plan for me. It is one of the more high priced delivery options available, which is why I took off one star. The other two stars were taken because of the high amount of food that was already spoiled on the first day of the first delivery! All the spring mix salads contained spoiled lettuce and greens, while some of the ‚Äúfresh‚Äù vegetables were already turning from green to yellow. I recommend ordering meal options that are not salads to get the most edible food for your dollar. This is not a food service plan I can recommend, I‚Äôm sorry to say. I did order a second week‚Äôs worth of food and will update my review after it artivrs.

Healthy, flavorful food that is also filling. Simple to prepare to eat. Good portion sizes. Like the variety from week to week. All items stay fresh except for apples and bell peppers. They seem to become mushy so I have pulled them out and replaced with my own.

The food is good but I have to rate you below average due to the packaging and the shipping. One of my items leaked into the meal and overall I have a real concerned that the food is not sealed. Sorry, but your competitor Spendid Spoon whom I use, seals and boxes my food for the same price. Just wanted you to know.
The food was excellent and SO fresh! Delivery was spot on - and the customer service provided is prompt and considerate.
So far every meal has been fresh and delicious! Great flavors and never too salty or over seasoned. Very impressed with the quality.
I really enjoy Sprinly meals. They are convenient, healthy and flavorful. I have tried several meal delivery companies and Sprinly is the best!

I placed one order (12 meals) and paused my account so I was quite alarmed when I received Sprinly emails the following Monday stating that another 12 meals were on their way. I immediately notified my credit card company and discovered (as if their business practices couldn't get any more suspect), Sprinly actually billed me 2x for the same order (3 days apart) for a total of over $400 for food I did not want. Customer service did confirm my account was paused and I would not be responsible for the charges.
So helpful, kind, and understanding! I appreciated the help!
Everything was packaged neatly and was kept cold. Tried the first meal today (burrito bowl) and it was fresh, flavorful, and satisfying.
The food is delicious, the portions are good, and the packaging is minimal. I feel great after eating it, most importantly.

I keep trying Sprinly hoping there has been an improvement on shipments of perishable food. The challenge is I have to throw away damaged, contaminated with plastic, meals. It continues to be a disappointment.
The ingredients and how they are prepared. Make them a delicious meal.

I just got home from a long day at work, and my meals are NOT HERE!!!!! They were supposed to be delivered today. This is highly frustrating and disappointing!!!! I just began using your service, and already have gotten off to a Horrible start!!
Loved the ease of ordering and the delivery of our weekly meals. The meals were different and varied from anything I could cook

Packaging was poor. The top of the box was open and it was left on the corner of my porch, not near the door. A few meals had contents leaking out the sides. One of the dressing containers was cracked and leaking, and one of the meal containers was cracked. The meals themselves were pretty good. I enjoyed the mushroom lentil burgers. My only complaint about the food was that the lettuce for the salads wasn‚Äôt very fresh and one was watery.

None of the meals that arrived were similar to the ones shown in the photos and most were inedible. Even the best one, a handful of brown rice penne (that look, felt, and tasted like cardboard) and some vegetable pasta sauce, was not a $20 meal. Their falafel is not fried, ground chickpeas. It is whole chickpeas in a loosely formed patty maybe minimally cooked in an oven? And on day 4 it had turned green in my fridge. It was horrid. I am not sure where all the great reviews are coming from?
All of the entrees arrived messy. Some of the entrees had elements that would be good to be separate from other food it was packaged with, but it was all slopped together

One of the package were spilled and the sauce spilled all over, very messy. Each container, after its all mixed combines to a portion. How is this measured correctly that is appropriate for me and my son?
I am wonderfully surprised at how fresh delicious and healthy these meals are.
Fast and fresh delivery I did experience one meal having gone bad, but that‚Äôs OK. I kind of expected it.
Packaging is fantastic. I love that I dont have to prepare anything when I get home from work!! So far all of our meals have been good, some great! Looking forward to week number two!!
I only wanted one week of food not continuous deliveries. I am going out of the country this week for a month. Then moving to NY. Stop with the deliveries.
Very easy to prepare and the food is great, especially the added sauce and condiments. Comes well packaged
The meals that I picked I felt had way too much garlic and spices that laugh to taste in my mouth and stayed with me all day long. Otherwise, the food was delicious just overpowering.
All of the meals have been so delicious. I am really enjoying having healthy meals in my fridge ready to go!
Food is fresh and inviting. Nice variety of meals. "Cooking" time is 2 1/2 minutes max and prep work already done. So easy and so delicious!
Sprinly delivers on time and it is wonderfully packed. It is easy to indicate what dishes to order and which to not. Sprinly offers a variety of dishes every week.

Have only had 3 meals so far. Biggest issue to me was the pasta dishes - I felt that more sauce was needed. I did ultimately add more tomato sauce to one dish. The Mac and cheese was very very dry. I did add some cream, but vegan cheese is very dry and I felt there should have been more sauce available. I am going to be having surgery and will need meals I don't have to do too much to. I will continue to test out the different meals to see which are best for me.

Meals were great! Fresh! I will continue to order. It is so great to get in late from work and not have to first start cooking. And I just love that there is a demand for this type of healthy eating. Long time coming. I‚Äôm so grateful! Thank you Sprinly ‚ù§Ô∏è

The first 2 meals we rec'd were well packed, and tasty. One of third meals was not edible, because the lasagna wasn't completely cooked with leakage from the salad. The salad had to be thrown away, and we cooked the lasagna longer for my husband. I called a Springly about this, and they credited my account for the meal. They said that this is an issue sometimes that occurs in transit. They're working on creating pouches for their sauces. This will be a great improvement. Susan
I have not finished my week's food but the ones I have had, are wonderful. Food is fresh and the taste has been exceptional.
By the time I get my shipment the food is spilled all over the inside of the container. Salad dressing is empty and not contained in its container.

did not like not having any to ask questions. I still do not have an answer as to how much i was charged. I signed up 2x by accident. also it looks like there was a 3 charge with no explanation  Please respond by email or call me 504 596-2444
Liked the salads, but plant based meats etc not our thing. They were beautifully presented and very fresh, however. If you like all plant based food this will satisfy you perfectly.
The delivery and packaging were perfect. Ingredients were good, but mine were just a day late in freshness. The entrees themselves were fine, but not great.
High quality ingredients and very tasty meals
I like the idea of organic plant-based foods‚Äî I found it to be an acquired taste.
The meals I have had so far are just average. Not much flavor. Good quality ingredients but with all the packaging and the expense, just not a great deal.
Love the packaging and convenience. A couple of the meals were bland but most are pretty tasty. Portion size is generous.
The food was good but I had frozen the meals and destroyed the salads
The food tasted fresh and flavorful. Portions were perfect and the variety was great!
I am a new customer for only a week, but so far I love the food. Delivery was great. Everything is perfect.

Delicious!!! I like it very much. The food is not 1.5 serving but enough for one person. But will I tell friends about it. Very healthy food. Will continue for months. I‚Äôm glad I found this company.
Great tasting food. Meals are well rounded & filling. I liked the variety of flavors each day.
2 of my meals, the covers were broken and the quinoa and salad dressing was everywhere. The 2 noodle peanut sauce dishes were missing the tofu...

A couple of my meals went bad too fast. I mean they smelled horrible when I opened container, one was on the 5th day and one was on the 6th day. I can't get the smell out of my mind, that is why I cancelled.
I do not like all the salt in the meals I chose. I wish there were taste sos free or very low salt and sugar options and no oil.
Very disappointed in the quality and we really wanted to like this company. Lackluster flavor and not worth the price.
Responding to any concerns was extremely prompt and professional. All the best!
Love all the meals and can‚Äôt wait for the next shipment! It‚Äôs just what I have been looking for. I am amazed at the quality and flavor!

Even though my delivery was a day late. The meals for this week were good. It is nice to have ready made vegan meals at home that I don't have to go out for. The meals are filling, most are enough for 2 meals. They have to be "spiced up" a bit, but overall, so far I am happy with the meals that I have received.
I like the quality and vegetables and could use more vegetables.
The service is great. The food is fresh and easy to prepare. The seasoning is lacking but that is ok because I season it myself.
Food is good, and pleased. I was concerned when I got home and the box was pretty beat up.  Mark
I liked some of the meals and others did not agree with me. The frittata messed up my stomach / digestion for 2 days. Also, why all the yeast in the products?
I love the food! The quality is great. The portions are sensible. I just wish it was slightly less expensive!
The food was fresh and tasty. Makes eating plant based a bit easier with such a busy schedule
Liked: large portions  Disliked: tiny, hard quinoa; not packed well‚Äîquinoa everywhere in the box.
The food is delicious. No meal has been bad‚Ä¶
If I didn‚Äôt get the meals from them, I would never know they are plant-based.
Awesome food! Healthy great testing! Great service! Keep it up!!
The meals so far are very good only received my first order this week.
Fabulous food, fresh organic, delicious and plenty of it.
I am unable to create an on line account. Do not like that the food is on a truck for 2 days.

For the price charged this was a ripoff. The meals come with salads that turn to a brown mess after 24 hours. Only one out of the three recipes we tried was half tasy. Definitely not worth $16.50 a meal!
The portions are very small. The meals are very bland and lack in flavor and salt. Very disappointed.
Very fresh well conceived meals Very grateful VDoney
Delivery good- a dollar per meal more than I like to pay.
Just had our first meals from Sprinly- delicious and so easy!!
couldn't get lid off one of the plastic containers.

package did not arrive on the day expected.
excellent! really delicious and fresh. EASY!
The dishes did not agree with me and the dishes I have tried are not very flavorful. Easy to order and heat up.
So far, and this has been my first order, everything is great!
Quality food, very fresh. Great taste. Love that it was easy to prepare and eat.
Food is delicious, filling and fresh!
Love this place everything was great sofar.
All of the meals were fresh and delicious!
I like the food and the detailed instructions.
Didn‚Äôt care for 3 The other three were ok
Do not like the food. Was not fresh and was shipped from Ohio to TN
So far my first two meals have been delish!
The customer service and quality of food is exceptional!!
Great food - excellent service!
Tasty meals! Looking forward to upcoming delivery.
Fabulous food! Fresh, amazing ingredients.
healthy, quite tasty, easy to prepare
Delivery great. Food selection good.
I like the meals. Good portion for the meal.
Great healthy fresh food. It is a treat, just heat and eat.
Fits my dietary preferences.
apparent lack nutrition experience of the company.
Great , Fresh and healthy food
