My first week of meals were amazing. It was exactly what I was hoping it would be. Every meal was fresh, flavorful, easy to prepare, and different. The portions were perfect. I was full after each meal. I loved the different dressings and sauces. I can't wait for my next set of meals to arrive. You have a new devoted customer. Keep up the amazing work! Thank you!
All the food was bland and tasted the same
The food is good, fresh, easy to heat & organic. Being vegan & organic is very important to us. My only negative would be the cost.
Food was tasty. Easy to prepare and quick. Perfect for the busy person who wants to be health conscious.

I was very eager to recieve my first order. The item arrived well packaged...though it would have been even better to recieve on a Mon/Tues.  The handwritten note was a nice touch.  Meal packaging is terrible. I struggled to get the containers with soup and pastas open and when I did there were bits of plastic floating in the food because they cracked open. This was a struggle for EVERY MEAL. For $18 per meal I'd expect not to have plastic in my food.  The food was not great. It lacked flavor and substance. The soup tasted like wet dog which was hard to eat (but again for $18 I forced myself to). I did enjoy the acorn squash meal most. The salads should not be included. Again for $18 Id much prefer food over leaves (that arrive soggy from sitting in the pre opened dressing). I was hardly satisfied and am hoping the next round of meals is a bit better. Though my expectations are far lower.
Ease of use. No cooking required. Above all else, delicious meals!
Food is amazing and portions are very generous. Servive had been wonderful!
Not a big fan. Haven't ate all if the dinners but the ones I have ate have been very bland. I need to get use to plane based meals and how to make them more flavorful.
Everything is delicious, fresh and well packaged

As a gluten-sensitive, dairy-sensitive vegetarian who doesn't love cooking, I was thrilled to discover Sprinly ‚Äî and that they deliver even to my small town. My initial experience was good for the most part. Pros: - most meals were tasty - all were easy & quick to prepare - simple, healthy ingredients Cons: - several of my containers arrived partially open, and things spilled - most of the meals were a little carb-heavy for me (good carbs, like sweet potatoes and quinoa and lentils, but I'd prefer meals that are heavier on vegetables) - the marketing emails suggest you can choose your meals, but you can't. You can choose not to receive them on specific weeks, and you can choose not to get certain meals ‚Äî but then you have to double up on others. There are no additional choices.  Overall, I'm excited about the potential and looking forward to trying the service for a few more weeks at least.

The presentation is very good. The meals should not only be good for you, but they have to be tasty, otherwise you will not stick with them That is the problem in my view. They largely lacked taste. The fritata was too dry, so was the hamburger. The soba stuff was not and it was good.
The food is wonderful and tasty! I will keep ordering!
I love how the food came wrapped and packaged at my doorstep. The food was very delicious and filling and oh so fresh too!
Delicious!!! The meals are tasty and the portions are filling. We‚Äôve tried other meal services and this is the best bang for your buck. Love that the ingredients are fresh and mostly organic.
Food was really good delivered on time and super easy.

Packaging as good - no leakages or spills (which I have experienced with other meal deliveries), food tastes good. I have food allergies (almond coconut) which you seem to use a lot so I wished you had more chosen for people with allergies
The food has been great and it actually helps me with my exercise goals. I do recommend the service. I am impressed.
AMALFI LENTIL BOLOGNESE came with damaged sauce package which left many pieces of plastic in sauce. I had to throw it out. That‚Äôs approximately $20 in the trash. Rest of meals are okay, so far.
Wife has broken arm so I cook .This makes it easy for me and good tasting also.
Food is fresh, delicious, and keeps me satiated for a long time.
I love the meals. The spicy curry meal, the spice wasn‚Äôt overwhelming which was great.

Sprinly has been Absolutely amazing both with customer service and their meals. I am so exited to eat everyday because the meals have such depth and are truly delicious! Their food is exceptional and surpasses all other plant based options on the market. Thank you so much for creating wonderful gluten free, plant based clean meal options!
Food is nice. I think a little salty for me. It tastes good, but I‚Äôm itchy for 24 hrs after.

The meals are delicious, my 5 yr old picky eater LOVES the tofu with peanut sauce. Literally the only thing she eats entirely. I‚Äôm so excited to be making this investment in my health. Delivery and customer service went above and beyond to deliver my order. It‚Äôs very pricey with the delivery fee, but I guess I‚Äôll manage.

Packaging is great. Portion sizes are huge-enough for 2 meals. The food is exceptional. I love the taste and texture of everything so far. I love that everything is freshly made and organic. I am so happy that I gave this a try.

I am not receiving my meals and I am continuing to be charged the last several weeks. I have reached out to your customer service via email a few days ago and no response. You have until Wednesday or I will need to report the charges as fraudulent with my bank and will cancel my brand new subscription. Experience has been horrible!
First order- it was amazing! So quick and healthy. Just what I was looking for!
The packaging and delivery was excellent. No low carb options with exceptions of salads.

The meals are very tasty, well-prepared and easy to fix/serve... especially for someone like myself, who really doesn't cook!  There is good variety, and all of the ingredients are very healthy. No sugar, healthy fats, and healthy greens and grains.  I was looking for a healthy, plant-based food delivery service, and so far Sprinly has been great!  I am recommending it to friends.
I'm just getting starting but my first order was good... It's a little expensive which is why I only give them 4 stars.
I love the fresh greens and the sauces. For me, I wasn't the biggest fan of the lentil burgers, and the potatoes with that meal were a little dry/lacking flavor.

The meals are incredibly healthy but they lack taste and are high in carbs and low in protein. We'd love more high-protein (no soy, though) and veggie-based meals and fewer grains and potatoes. Sweet potatoes are okay, though.  Also, the falafel was not a falafel at all. It was more of a garbanzo protein patty. Did not love it at all. It lacked taste.  We'll try one or two more weeks and see if the meals, this week, were just a miss. Perhaps next week's meals will be tastier and higher in protein,
Have tried two meals so far, the food is delicious and flavorful. Excited to try more!

The meals are delicious and easy to fix. Salads are especially outstanding. However, the Italian pasta didn‚Äôt work for me because I used the microwave to prepare it, so the pasta wasn‚Äôt thoroughly cooked. But the reason I won‚Äôt order it again is because the red sauce triggered one of the worst acid reflux attacks I‚Äôve ever had. I probably won‚Äôt order the sweet potato tacos again because the tortillas were too small to wrap around the large portions at all, making it an extremely messy meal to eat, with grains and chunks of food littering both my table and my clothes. And with some of the dishes, considering how large your portions, it would be nice to have slightly more sauce for them, especially in regards to the salads. Even with moving the salad around with a fork, it didn‚Äôt succeed in getting the sauce all the way down through some of the dishes. Note: my review is covering my first week, November 24-29
Overall, pleased with the quality and taste of the food. Delivery was okay, but two items were damaged and the food spilled out - not good.
Super delicious, fresh ingredients and it makes my life easier. What‚Äôs not to love. Thank you

All good options, easy and quick to put together. I love the mix of hot and cold ingredients and the balance of flavors. I also appreciate that it is truly whole food plant based - low on oils and packed with fresh ingredients. The only one we did not like was the pasta option. Gluten free pasta does not really stay fresh if not eaten immediately after cooking. It was crumbly and hard.
Best online meals I‚Äôve ever had. I look forward to receiving quality & variety every time.
The food is tasty, I added a few spices. The meals provide ideas for future meals to prepare creative meals.
Food was great! Loved the presentation and customer service!

Never received the first order. Finally recipes send second one today. I‚Äôll let you know how it taste once I get back from my trip. Glad the second order came today! The team was helpful to refund my first order. Thx
I never received my food. I also tried to reach out to support and never heard anything. Obviously the charge is getting declined on my credit card.
Most meals were great. Love the nutritional information. My only disappointment were some soggy carrot strips and vegetables in a more salad type entree.

the obsession is real. where have yall been all my life?!? clean, organic, tasty. you‚Äôve taken the stress out of lists and recipes and you have gifted this tired mama clean options that nourish. what a gift you are to a world of fast, chemical loaded menus. thank you for being you. thank you for caring about us. all of us. sprinly forever.

Rachel N. Helped me process the order when I was already late ordering Wednesday. She understood the concern about my daughter having COVID and me gifting her sprinly. She was very courteous and processed my 2 weeks order and also graciously agreed to stop it after 2 weeks. Excellent service.
Packing is great. Food is not flavorful in the least bit. We have been so sad about the meals.

The food was excellent--delicious and fresh! I love the meals and feel good about eating them.  My only request would be an approximate "best by" date on the meals, in case I cannot eat them right away. One meal was marked with "eat this first" but I did not feel any real confidence on how many days the rest of the meals could sit in my fridge before being no longer good to consume.  I will definitely keep ordering Sprinly--excited to try more of the meals!!
Communications online were clear, sensible. Diet restrictions too narrow for me.
The food is amazing. Every meal has been as fresh as if I made it myself. The ingredients are healthy but also taste great.

Everything so far is delicious! The meals don't look like their pictures but still just as appetizing: plenty of fresh vegetables and leafy greens. Which means they don't freeze well and it would be better to heat them in a pan than in a microwave. But, again, very delicious and I'll keep subscribing especially when I received a beautiful handwritten thank you card!
Every meal was delicious!! Easy to hear and very filling. I‚Äôd never be able to prepare all of that alone! Love love this company. Second week will be delivered soon! Can‚Äôt wait

I was looking for a provider willing to process bereavement gifts as a one-time thing. I wanted to send a week worth of vegetarian meals for a couple who are going through a difficult time. Most providers required a subscription plan which is something I didn't want. I reached out to their customer service, and they were very supportive and accommodating. They ensured my order would be handled as a one-time purchase. I couldn't give them five stars because the automated system automatically processed my "subscription" and charged me for the 2nd week. The customer service was able to stop the subscription and gave me a refund on the 2nd charge. My only tip, I would suggest they add this fantastic feature online for others to consider purchasing. Amazing folks! I'd recommend them!

I was very apprehensive about ordering meals through a prepared delivery service. In particular because the meals ship from another time zone. The meals arrived very well packaged, cold not frozen and fresh. Fresh like I‚Äôd ordered in a restaurant. Even the salads were super crisp and fresh. I thoroughly enjoyed 5 of the 6 meals. Healthy & delicious! The 6th simply because I don‚Äôt care for tofu. Moving forward I now know I can swap out a meal. I‚Äôm excited to receive my next 6 delicious meals. Additionally, the 1st shipment came with a handwritten note. These folks really seem care about their products quality and satisfaction of their customer. Highly recommend.

I was out of town and my neighbor picked up the food for me . I told her to share it and enjoy. She did and shared the bounty with several other neighbors! They all lived it and wanted information to find out about ordering. Since this was my first shipment, and my trip was delayed.. I haven't even tried it myself, but am already promoting the product!

I mostly enjoyed the meals. Some of them were odd, I couldn't put my finger on exactly what it was. The closest I can pinpoint is that I got the sense that one or some of the ingredients were close to going bad without being bad. This tainted the initial feel of the meal but was not enough to ruin the entire meal. They were good though. I really love that the salad dressings are made with fruit puree. I chose Sprinly because I am gluten free and dairy free because of allergies, I bought meat to pair with the meals, but found that I really didn't need to add meat and didn't crave it like I have with other vegan meals.
Not a lot of menu choices. Although the portions are perfect in size, they aren‚Äôt nutritionally balanced. High on carb side. They are tasty still!
I love how the food is its own complete meal, full of color and nutrients, and very delicious! And filling!
Except for the one that had some kind of hot tomato soup - it was awful - the other ones were really really good. Thankyou,I am glad I found you
taste delicious and are fresh as well as organic.
I just received my first order. I've tried two meals so far and they were both amazing!!
terrible terrible terrible. package came melted, all the water seeped into my food and nothing was edible. TERRIBLE SERVICE
Taste so good and very filling. I never enjoyed Tofu so much!!

In general the food was fine, However there was some inconvenience in prepping, serving and enjoying. Separating some of the elements was awkward. Some items absolutely, for me, had to be cooked. The raw carrots, cabbage etc were less than enjoyable. Tofu was excellently prepped.
Please cancel my future orders. Do not like the taste of food. Sweet potatoes were hard!!

I am so excited to have found a vegan clean meal. I was getting bored with eating the same thing night after night and Sprinly made eating enjoyable again. Thank you for making vegan meals because where I live there is no restaurants that are plant based so this meal service is a life saver.
I‚Äôve been very happy so far. You can tell they put a lot of care into making their food and creating the packaging. It‚Äôs very healthy and delicious and I‚Äôm glad I gave it a shot!

Nutritious AND delicious with truly healthful ingredients! As a family with varying food intolerances, Sprinly exceeded my expectations and will make cooking a lot less demanding and allow me to spend more time doing the things I love : ) Thank you!

You have put together some of the most wonderful meals I‚Äôve ever eaten in my entire life. I could not begin to achieve this level of expertise or fine ingredients, I do not see how you do it but you are miracle workers. I applaud you!!!

I love the food. Taste great and makes my whole body feel better. I had a couple months however when the packages got delivered late or the ice was melted and the meals spoiled within two or three days. Since that time I stopped ordering during the summer and may try again when it gets cooler in the fall.
I love Sprinly because it makes eating healthy very easy.
I love you, Sprinly. I am a not vegan, not vegetarian and Sprinly makes me not miss any of that other stuff.

Always good but this particular time the delivery was a day later than usual. The cool packs were cold but at liquid stage instead of some solid. Maybe the bottom pack was still somewhat solid/liquid mix but the other two (top, middle) were liquid but cool. So meals were still good. It was Labor Day weekend prior so I think you all mentioned that delivery would be different in a email. I got used to getting the deliveries with the solid or semi solid cool packs. I get a little antsy when the packs are mostly liquid that‚Äôs all. Have a great day! With the reply I agree and updated to 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è

I love your food. The quality is excellent! I have tried other vegan companies - yours, by far is my favorite. The main reason I may skip a week here and there is I wish there were more variety in the dishes, and how about desserts!
Awesome options and very user-friendly prep. I‚Äôm excited for more updates and the customer service is also very responsive. Many thanks for healthy eating!

Food is very good and fresh. I've had a few instances where packaging is not as good as it could be. There have been tops popped off, a rubber band in the food, and food askew in the cardboard container. However, I enjoy the meals and look forward to eating healthy lunches.

I would never get this again, my meal with shredded brussel sprouts went off, they turned brownish and I had to throw them away and the risotto was off. I received it the moment it came and put in the back of my refrigerator.
Sometimes I feel it is a little pricey but worth it for the organic ingredients and no other way to ship and keep cold.
I had some initial delivery issues, but working with sprinly's team fixed them!
Great variety and such good quality, yummy meals! I love knowing I am eating healthy, whole foods that are well balanced without having to do any work!

Sprinly meals are always tasty and enjoyed. I look for delivery every week to see what‚Äôs for dinner. Sometimes I remember in time to select my own meals. Instructions make every dish easy to prepare because most of the work is already done!
Healthy, easy and they taste good!
At the last.moment when there was nothing I could do you canceled my order. There has to be a better system. My Am Ex number was changed because of fraud.
I love the meals, the responsive support team and the whole project of veggie-based eating.

I noticed that salads are a bit run down and not particularly fresh. It might depend on the fact that it takes 2 days for the box to arrive and if 2 more days go by before it‚Äôs consumed, it looses its freshness. For that I prefer the meals which require some cooking. Sometimes I have received shuttered internal plastic containers and the pieces of plastic where everywhere in the food. Dangerous! So far I have enjoyed few recipes, the rest I found not so enjoyable. I think I will take a break now and see if I will continue to use your services.
My daughter is gluten free and we are all vegan. So it is amazing to be able to get such delicious food every week that we can all eat!
Sprinly is a lifesaver! With a super busy career & family, I don't have time to meal prep for myself. Thanks to Sprinly I have delicious, fresh, amazing vegan meals.
Super tasty and fresh!  Great experience.

Healthy and tasty vegetarian meals. Delivered by a company with excellent customer service and responsiveness. I have used them for a few years, since Covid. I don't like to cook, but like to eat and want healthy food. I would like a little more variety in offerings.

I love Sprinly. In the beginning I had some issues with broken containers and spoiled food. They corrected that quickly. The food is really fresh and the flavor combinations are delicious...and most of all its healthy. I don't have time to cook or prepare healthy, this is a life saver!
One of the food containers broke and the food spilled out so I couldn‚Äôt eat it

I am enjoying my meals from Sprinly very much! I love their flexibility in letting me opt out from those I'm not crazy about and double-up on my favorites for that week. I also love the flexibility of being able to skip weeks when I'll be out of town, or when I have just met friends at restaurants a lot so have gotten backed up at home. The website it very easy to navigate and my account easy to manage. It's great to get good and fresh vegan meals without the work of planning, shopping, cooking, and cleaning up. Checks off everything on my list.

I'm having a wonderful experience with Sprinly thus far, whilst eating probably the most healthily of my life. As I'm only eating one, sometimes two, meals a day, Sprinly is my chief source of nutrition. Meals are tasty but not sugary, addictively tasty, which is a very good thing: so you're not as likely to overeat or have cravings throughout the day. After a hiccup or two with shipping, meals are now arriving insanely fast and fresh. Occasionally will arrive with a broken container within individual meal packaging, leaking sauce into other portions of the meal, and once received two of the same meal instead of the six different I ordered, but all in all couldn't be more pleased.
Food arrived on time and fresh but the rubber bands didn't keep all food particles inside.
Meal lids sometimes separate from package. Need rubber bands on all meals. Plastic sauce containers crack releasing contents. Bags of sauce work better!
Excellent customer service. Delicious meals. Easy to choose meals or skip a week. Only drawback is what to do with the containers and ice packs. They provide suggestions.
Great staffing on your phone service the galls are efficient friendly and know the product line very well

The food is ready good great tasting. Sauces awesome. Some times when food is delivered the covers are loose. I would like to see it sealed. The ice is always thawed when food arrives. Sometimes the zucchini noodles are mushy in a couple days.

Sprinly meals are delicious and fresh every time. They us fresh ingredients without any preservatives or additives. I have been getting 5 meals a week for the past 6 months. I have had many other pre-packaged meal plans. And after a while, everything tastes the same and you get sick of it. Not Sprinly, I still look forward to my meal every day.  I am not vegan, not even vegetarian but I tried Sprinly because it's fresh. Now that my I eat Sprinly five days a week it has made a huge difference in my body. Less inflammation, less brain fog, more energy; all my systems are optimized.

I live in Texas and the first shipment was delayed resulting in spoiled food which was disappointing because it looked like it would have been so good. The company gave me a credit for that order and the next order came on time and everything was delicious. However, I cancelled my subscription because the weather is too hot until the end of Sept. and any delay results in spoiled food which I understand is out of Sprinly's hands.

Received 12 meals a week for months. Unfortunately 2 or 3 meals would have to be thrown away in the first or second day after delivery. The mold was always on broccoli. I‚Äôve let them know. I really want them to resolve this since vegans don‚Äôt have much options. I didn‚Äôt want to stop but throwing away a pricey meal like this, I just had to. I want to call the owner of this company and tell them to get it together. I would absolutely reorder if they could guarantee I could eat every meal.

The food is good & fresh. The packaging could still use some work as the plastic lids seem to get broken easily in shipping. Sometimes they come apart from the container. I would like half portions as an option as the portions are often too large.
Food is delicious, very complex interesting flavors burst forth. And the portions are very filling which is hugely important to me.
The food was old and mushy. Not happy with the service.

The food was inconsistent. Some meals were delicious, other were throw aways. THe biggest problem is the customer service and delivery service. Meals came broken open, spilled and covered in the chemical ice slime. Also, there is an outrageous anount of recycling material. Customer service takes weeks to respond. Would not recommend this.
These meals are awesome! Very healthy and tasty. Perfect portion sizes. Great meal solution for a single healthy person. Also, I lost two pounds in the first week!
Delivery and personal note very nice. Food was ok , not great and salad was not fresh after 24 hours.

We love Sprinly at our house. It‚Äôs what I‚Äôve been searching for in a meal service - very little cooking (just warming up) and ***fresh*** food. It is delicious and has improved our health. The meal variety is great too.
We did not like the change Purina made in its dry cat food...but this is no reflection on CHEWY. AS usual their prices are good, their service is excellent and they are easy to communicate with.
I didn't receive my order that I had paid for up front.
The food was excellent!!! Sprinly was great when we did not know what to make. I love to cook in the fall and winter.  We will be back! Sincerely, Sunami

LOVED Sprinly!  Used the meal service for 6 weeks as a way to improve my health. I switched to ALL vegan diet after have health concerns and wanted to reduce the inflammation in my body and figure out what food were best for me. Sprinly made this very easy to do - currently feeling 100% better and following a significantly more plant based diet as a result of Sprinkle's delicious foods!
We are impressed with the quality and variety. Love the sauces!
Food tasted terrible. It was impossible to cancel the next order. I ended up throwing it out.
This was the worst food I ever ordered. It was completely inedible. I threw it all out.
Nice job. Always polite. It‚Äôs easier to get ahold of Sprinly by email. They try to please. Food is fresh.
Too many greens for me, but there was good flavor. I was very hungry all the time, believe I need more protein.
I liked the salads the best. I finally decided I am just not ready for plant based meals.

Love the food - I commute between Los Angeles and Atlanta . It was getting hard to figure out the dates when I would be here and the deadline for the next week delivery . When my life is back to normal I will be ordering every week . Thanks
I have never received my order. I paid and didn‚Äôt receive anything. Please have someone contact me.  Thank you  Erin
Lacked flavor and basically just not appealing at all

Did not like the food, ordered just 2 weeks and had to throw food in garbage.. could not palate it I had high hopes, as I love all veggies, but only endless pasta and grains - no taste - no fresh herbs or fresh veggies , or spices

We have LOVED every meal. My spouse and I share a meal the portions are so generous. Such a sense of relief knowing we are eating healthy plant-based meals with organic ingredients that are well-designed and enjoyable. I personally like the informational tidbits about the nutrition and nutrients on the packaging. Thank you!

I am so thankful for Sprinly! The meals are beautifully packaged and so easy to prepare. It is the perfect solution for truly healthy meal options for a busy lifestyle. I have thoroughly enjoyed every one I have tried! I highly recommend it!
These meals were so flavorful! I was shocked‚Ä¶in a good way.
The food is good and healthy and I appreciate the portion size. However, I do wish there was more variety in the menu.
Great food. Why did it stop?

I had a problem placing my order in that I kept getting an error. I contacted them directly via email and was assured that my order was complete. In this emailed I mention my delivery date of 7/25. I received an email/text confirming the the week of my delivery and it was for the following 1st week in August. This felt like 2 strikes and I decided to cancel the entire order. I was reponded to quickly and kindly and was assured that my order was cancelled and that I would not be charged. As it turned out, I was indeed not charged but the food was still delivered. It is a shame because I had ordered from another company for the same week and much of it went to waste. Great concept but I feel that the administration side needs to be upgraded.

have thoroughly enjoyed your meals friend. so easy to prepare. ridiculously fresh. love the flavors‚Ä¶not overwhelming, they truly compliment the food. and the sauces ‚òÄÔ∏è‚òÄÔ∏è‚òÄÔ∏è amazing. light but rich and savory. my belly is very happy
I loved the meals I AM JUST JUST CONCERNED SOME WERE HIGH IN CALORIES BUT ALL THE FOOD WAS DELICIOUS

I loved the first week but second week the food was not as good and it did not stay fresh enough long enough. I learned to order my own meals too to make sure I pick meals I think I would like. The medallion beet salad was incredibly great. I appreciate the credit I was given to get a week free. I will be ordering again soon.

The food is organic-this is very important for me. Plus it is delicious and very fresh. And the packing is just excellent. It is always delivered on time. Price is reasonable. This company really respects their customers. Thank you!
All the food I received was warm and unsafe to eat.

I really enjoyed the service I received from Springy. I needed a break from cooking for awhile, but didn't like the idea of always buying food out. The food was tasty and the meals were well planned out. I'm very particular about the food I eat, and the idea that the food is organic was a major plus. I highly recommend Springy!

I‚Äôve enjoyed most of the meals I‚Äôve received. Once I became familiar with the ordering process I was able to get the meals I preferred. Often I would only see duplicate meals in one week because the menu might not be varied enough for my taste. The meals are perfectly balanced nutritionally which I appreciate because when I cooking my own meals -this was a challenge. The Meals arrive like clockwork each week, fresh and packed in ice. My only complaint is when I eat out, I‚Äôm not sure if I can freeze some of the meals if they begin to pile up because they are fresh, e.g salads, etc In summary, I‚Äôm enjoying the pleasure of not having to cook especially since I‚Äôm single with only myself to worry about.
Sparingly is very fresh. Even though I am not use to eat carbs such as pasta the ingredients are so clean they don‚Äôt upset my stomach or make me feel heavy or low energy

I am really liking this food delivery company! Everything is ready to go you just heat it up or whatever instructions say on back ! The food is very well made and fresh and the ppl working at Sprinly are so caring and respectful! 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è I tried Martha Stewart‚Äôs but way too much to do with her stuff .. read cut stuff up cook this cook that TOO MUCH WORK ! Sprinly is my YES!!! Super healthy my hubby and I share 1 meal and add a fruit or bread . No over eating and filling bad thank you ! üòä From Texas
I would like more seasoning, such as cumin, smoked paprika, garlic powder, tumeric, red pepper flakes. Also, I don't eat starches, would like to do without the rice, or noodles.

I have searched and searched for vegan food that was delivered to my area. I was so excited to finally find something. When I received my first box, it was a day late, stuck somewhere. Its hot this time of year in Texas so all my food was spoiled by the time it got to my house. No ice packets and the box was torn üòî I figured I'd give it one more try just incase something happened by accident....same thing happened. So sad.

I‚Äôve used your service many times and just became dissatisfied and cancelled because the meals turn moldy after literally 3-4 days. It has happened to me multiple times. The meals are not cheap to begin with, and having to throw the meal out because it has mold after a very short period after receiving it is unacceptable.

I‚Äôm sorry but it just came down to flavor and taste for me. I cook vegan at home and was wanting to not cook so much but this isn‚Äôt a replacement for us and I only lasted a week. It‚Äôs also very pricey for not being super delicious. I ordered a lot of meals so this review is based off tasting the entire menu for the week.

Yes, they are a little pricey. However, the food is absolutely delicious! I love the convenience of having fresh wholesome delicious food during a busy work week. I‚Äôm not a vegan but I do eat a more plant-based diet. I make healthy choices and these meals made it so simple. I would highly recommend giving them a try! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!
the food is ok not good. A few too watery and a few slimy and bad.
i was happy with delivery, food and price Thanks

It‚Äôs my first time using Sprinly and I will continue the subscription! First of: I loved the personal touch of a handwritten note‚Ä¶ a very nice touch! Second: the food is delicious! Easy to reheat, instructions are on every box, the boxes are marked to use first, early and so on. A no brainer. I love the fact that I can just transfer the contents to a plate and microwave‚Ä¶ and it‚Äôs ready. Third: organic and whole ingredients. No additives, no fillers, simple but good! Thank you!

To be honest, it was not good. I don't think I enjoyed any meal that I received. I knew I was only going to try one box because it is way too expensive but I was going to keep an open mind if I really liked it. Very disappointed. A couple meals I tossed after a couple of bites. I can make better vegan food myself. Sorry!

I never got to try your food because the delivery person left the box in direct sun, and failed to notify me of the delivery. So by the time I accidentally found the food, the ice had melted and the food was no longer cold. Both deliveries had to be discarded.
I have twice received orders where between one and four of my six meals were ruined due to poor packaging/leaks. For the price I am extremely disappointed.The quality of meals is hit and miss.

I appreciate the freshness and variety of your meals. I just find the flavors a bit bland.  Also while the packaging is designed to keep foods apart until consumed, in this day and age we need to find more environmentally friendly options than plastic.  There are few options of prepared meals for Vegans. Try this one.

I am really pleased with Springy, and love their food. I only held back a star because I'd like to see containers not be plastic, and can't think those plastic bags of gel are environmentally good either...

We were quite happy with our first shipment from Sprinly. So far, each meal we've shared has been delicious--servings are large enough to share or save leftovers for lunch the next day. Looking forward to seeing what next week's shipment brings. Fresh, never frozen, organic vegan meals!
Each box,3, where delivered a day late abd were softened and melted. I did not get my cc reimbursed as they said I would.

I ordered twice, and was really impressed with the handwritten note (although I got kindof the same one in both orders). I thought the packaging was really nice as well. Unfortunately I just didn't care for the food. I didn't even eat most of it. I had been using Sakara and they are much more expensive, but the quality of the food was far better.

I have thoroughly enjoyed the meals from Sprinly. The variety is incredible, and the flavors, sauces, dressings, and serving size has been more than I expected. And the freshness tells me they have nailed their process, quality control, and delivery challenges. As I'm transitioning to a plant-based diet-this has helped enormously as I learn to try more plant based recipes.

Unfortunately, they are new to Dallas, TX and didn‚Äôt realize how hot are summers are. My order arrived days later with the gel packs completely thawed. The box, product, and gel packs were all at 90 degrees, so I had to throw it all away. ü•≤ They refunded my money, but I asked for a response so that maybe we could work thru shipping problems on future orders. No one ever called, and I never reordered.

Food is fresh and needs to be eaten ASAP! If not eaten immediately, it goes bad. I believe organic flash frozen at peak of nutrition is a better way to go. Do not delay eating these meals, threw many away.

The 2 salads I received the lettuce was wilted and the blueberries were getting old. I had a few berries with mold on them. I didn't think they had a lot of variety. I am not a fan of Tofu. So my selections were few. I canceled my subscription due to lack of variety.
Knowing Springy is healthy for me and healthy for the planet would have been sufficient.... That it taste great is a bonus

The box was delivered upside down by FedEx - clearly not Sprinly's fault as the box was marked. However, three of the six meals had come open in transit as in the rubber band was in place, but the lid was not sealed and the lid was nowhere near the container. The ice packs were melted and the water was in those opened meals. The meals were a portion size for a child and left me hungry. For $19.83/a meal including tax it is so not worth the price. Almost $20 for a meal that wasn't at least mostly filling, I can't see where the convenience would be worth the $20 for a child sized portion meant for an adult.
Love the chile Absolutely delicious

Food is very good, but I really don't like the amount of waste in packaging. We used a different service in CA and food came in insulated bags with ice packs that could be left back out for the delivery driver to take bag and reuse.
Food was mostly good. Only one dish I really didn‚Äôt like and one more was pretty bland. Otherwise a good option for healthy eating with no effort.
I didn't have a very good experience with the website/billing. So that dampened my willingness to continue purchasing. It was a tiny nightmare actually.
Arrived days late warm and smelly.  Only plus was that customer service person I spoke with was very helpful.

Things we like are it‚Äôs healthy food and nearly ready to eat. Things we would like different are some foods like quinoa and carrots are under cooked and hard to eat. When we receive the package on Wednesday the ice packs are already thawed out so it shortens the life span of the veggies.

Having trouble liking the food and I think it‚Äôs probably me because I‚Äôm used to eating a different way so I‚Äôm seriously thinking I probably won‚Äôt re-order but I will try it for 2or 3 days before I decide

1. Most meals aren‚Äôt seasoned at all-you have to do that yourself. 2. Organic, all-natural, no canola oil, and vegan. 3. Nutritional yeast is used a lot and controversial (not a fan, personally). 4. The site has so many bugs and when I brought issues to customer support, they told me that their site works best on a computer-not phone. That is ridiculous, considering ~80% of online users are using a phone. 5. Customer support is great. 6. They have things they need to work through and recipes could use some elevation. I would give them another chance in the future.

My order was late. And when it did show all the ice had melted and the lids were loose and food was spilling out. It took several attempts to connect with customer service. I was essentially told you have no control once you give to your delivery people.  I was trying Sprinly after trying Martha Stewarts service. I wasn't crazy about her food but their delivery mechanism is amazing. They almost over communicate.

The concept is good. The flavors were all very similar. The portions were small for the price. The food packaging was always open upon arrival=the plastic containers were never shut. Plastic is wasteful especially because the containers don‚Äôt close completely, so I couldn‚Äôt even reuse. The cold packaging was questionable, my meals arrived at questionable temps. The ingredients were questionable-I‚Äôm military and cannot have hemp and it was easy to miss hemp in your ingredients. I‚Äôve switched to Daily Harvest which has fresh ingredients as well (frozen at harvest), at about half your cost, plus the portion and content is satisfying for a meal. Their packaging is compostable and their cold packaging kept my meals in their frozen state when they were left for hours in 92F heat/humidity.

3 out of 6 meals were spoiled within a day or two and 1 other meal had only about half as much food as I would have expected. The order before that had several issues as well and they only gave me a credit spread across two future orders. I made the mistake of trying again so I wasn't out that money, but now I'm out more. Won't be trying again.
I received a warm box 2 times...the shipping was anything but reliable and timely..the food was spoiled upon arrival.

I can't believe I waited this long to give Sprinly a try! I am a mostly plant based clean eating foodie who does love to cook. On those nights or days I just don't have the time or am exhausted, it's nice to finally have fresh meals delivered and made the way I eat with whole grains (brown rice and quinoa), no sugar. I love how they mark the ones you should eat first too! I have eaten 4 out of my 6 and can't wait to try the rest. Don't wait like I did....try it now üòç
Continued great quality and versatile menu. Delivery on time and in good condition.

It's very nice to have a simple, vegan meal to barely have to prepare at the end of the day. I wanted dinner with fresh food, rather than frozen, and Sprinly does this. However, some of the fresh food has been slimy, I have had to pick out rotten parts, and sometimes it is thrown together such that produce is hanging out the sides of the packaging. I hope that this is just growing pains, and that the quality control will improve in the future.

Food was not good and when it arrived at my home I went to unpackage it and the lid popped off two of the meals spilling all over the packaging box. I won‚Äôt order again. I contacted customer service about my experience and no resolution.
